attributes.comment:
We are currently in the process of our 2nd international adoption. The USCIS was
extremely helpful to us in our first international adoption. Thank you for all of your
assistance in bringing our precious son home.

I am concerned about the increased fees for the I-600A and fingerprinting. The
cost to adopt a child is already extremely high and prohibitive to some families. I
ask that you please not increase this cost. We are currently adopting from China,
and due to the long wait for a child right now in China, families are having to renew
their I-171H before their child is home. So these fees will have to be paid twice
within a single adoption process. Please help assist these families who work so
hard to bring these precious children into loving homes by not increasing the fees
associated with immigration.

Thank you.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Anonymous
